description:
11.177 noise
Add noise on video input frame.

The filter accepts the following options:
name: noise

options.description: Set noise seed for specific pixel component or all pixel components in case of all_seed. Default value is 123457.
options.name: all_seed

options.description: Set noise strength for specific pixel component or all pixel components in case all_strength. Default value is 0. Allowed range is [0, 100].
options.name: all_strength

options.description:
Set pixel component flags or set flags for all components if all_flags. Available values for component flags are:

‘a’

averaged temporal noise (smoother)

‘p’

mix random noise with a (semi)regular pattern

‘t’

temporal noise (noise pattern changes between frames)

‘u’

uniform noise (gaussian otherwise)
options.name: all_flags

options.description: Set noise seed for specific pixel component or all pixel components in case of all_seed. Default value is 123457.
options.name: c0_seed

options.description: Set noise strength for specific pixel component or all pixel components in case all_strength. Default value is 0. Allowed range is [0, 100].
options.name: c0_strength

options.description:
Set pixel component flags or set flags for all components if all_flags. Available values for component flags are:

‘a’

averaged temporal noise (smoother)

‘p’

mix random noise with a (semi)regular pattern

‘t’

temporal noise (noise pattern changes between frames)

‘u’

uniform noise (gaussian otherwise)
options.name: c0_flags

options.description: Set noise seed for specific pixel component or all pixel components in case of all_seed. Default value is 123457.
options.name: c1_seed

options.description: Set noise strength for specific pixel component or all pixel components in case all_strength. Default value is 0. Allowed range is [0, 100].
